abstract: This work was partly supported by the grant from Novel Pneumonia Emergency Science and Technology Project of Hubei Provincial (to [Honggang Yu]), Hubei Province Major Science and Technology Innovation Project (Grant No. 2018-916-000-008 to [Honggang Yu]).
author: Xiao Hu; Dexin Gong; Lilei Yu; Liang Zhang; Shan Hu; Kuo Zhang; Zehua Dong; Yonggui Wang; Huiling Wu; Honggang Yu; Xi Chen; Jun Chen; Biqing Zheng; Yijie Zhu; Jun Zhang; Yilin Zhao; Lianlian Wu; Youming Xu
title: Deep learning-based model for detecting 2019 novel coronavirus pneumonia on high-resolution computed tomography: a prospective study
